contentList.content: Once simply a pile of bones in an old tomb, you have not only been raised, you have also gone through an Awakening spell, bringing sentience back to what's left of your body.
You poke your finger into the lock, opening any lock.
As a Changeling, you possess Dark Vision and you can shapeshift to deceive those around you.
Changelings gain a bonus to Charisma, Darkvision, and the ability to use Disguise Self once per short rest.
Elf-like Changelings have an additional bonus to Intelligence.
Human-like Changelings have an additional bonus to Constitution.
You have Immunity to Poison Damage.
You are Vulnerable to Bludgeoning Damage, and take twice as much damage.
